Uses of Class
jsx.motion.Motion

Packages that use Motion
jsx.motion Provides clear-in-mind practicable methodologies for definition and utilization to step-motion models that are useful in designing animation, visual effects and vector graphics. 
jsx.motion.reg Provides regular motion functions and their operations. 
jsx.motion.reg.cmp Provides composite regular motion operations. 
jsx.motion.reg.cmp.bin Provides binary composite regular motion operations. 
jsx.ui.fx Classes for widgets to add visual effects to their underlying components. 
jsx.ui.vect Vector graphic widgets for interactive drawing based on canvas, SVG and VML. 
 

Uses of Motion in jsx.motion
 

Subclasses of Motion in jsx.motion
 class Fourier
          Defines motions by approximating sample data with a Fourier interpolation.
 class Interpolator
          An abstract base class to define motions by approximating sample data with various interpolation methodologies.
 class Linear
          Defines motions by approximating sample data with the simplest linear interpolation.
 class Regular
          Defines motions with various regular mathematical functions.
 class Speed
          Defines motions with the specified speed motion.
 class Spline
          Defines motions by approximating sample data with a cubic spline interpolation.
 

Methods in jsx.motion with parameters of type Motion
protected static int Motion.steps(Motion m)
          Gets the total number of steps in which the specified motion object is providing stepping data.
 

Constructors in jsx.motion with parameters of type Motion
Speed(Motion m)
          The typical constructor to construct a motion of this type.
 

Uses of Motion in jsx.motion.reg
 

Subclasses of Motion in jsx.motion.reg
 class Composite
          An abstract class to define a composite regular function.
 class Constant
          Defines constant regular functions whose value is always 0.
 class Cubic
          Defines cubic regular functions.
 class Quad
          Defines quadratic regular functions.
 class Quart
          Defines quartic regular functions.
 class Quint
          Defines quintic regular functions.
 class Uniform
          Defines constant regular functions whose value is always same as the value of its independent variable.
 

Uses of Motion in jsx.motion.reg.cmp
 

Subclasses of Motion in jsx.motion.reg.cmp
 class Binary
          An abstract class to define a composite regular function with two existing ones.
 class Mirror
          Defines a mirror function of the specified existing regular function.
 class Zoom
          Defines a composite regular function with an existing regular function scaled.
 

Uses of Motion in jsx.motion.reg.cmp.bin
 

Subclasses of Motion in jsx.motion.reg.cmp.bin
 class Both
          Defines a composite regular function with an existing regular function in charge of both the 1st and the 2nd halves of the domain.
 class Joint
          Defines a composite regular function by joining two existing regular functions with the 1st one in charge of the 1st half of the domain and the 2nd one, the 2nd half.
 

Uses of Motion in jsx.ui.fx
 

Fields in jsx.ui.fx with type parameters of type Motion
static Id<Motion> Effects.MOTION
          A global identifier for a configurable property of a Effects widget.
 

Methods in jsx.ui.fx that return Motion
static Motion Effects.getMotion(Effects fx)
          Returns the Motion object defined with a visual effects widget.
 

Uses of Motion in jsx.ui.vect
 

Methods in jsx.ui.vect with parameters of type Motion
static Component Graphic.curve(Graphic g, Motion m, int n)
          Draws a curve specified by a motion on a graphic widget.
